Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverGUI
public class GUIController extends Object implements ObserverGUI
Class that offers methods to modify and query the GUI (enabling/disabling, getting and updating).

      public void displayError(String errorDescription, boolean isGameEnding)
      Displays an error that occurred to the user though an alert box.
      Parameters:
      errorDescription - the error to display.
      isGameEnding - true if said error causes the game to stop.

    • initialDraw

      public void initialDraw(ObservableByClient game, String nickname)
      Draws all game components on the GUI.
      Parameters:
      game - The ObservableByClient which holds all data about the current game.
      nickname - The player associated with this GUI.

    • updateTurnOrder

      Parameters:

    • updateAssistants

      public void updateAssistants(String player, Integer assistantUsed, List<Integer> assistantsLeft)
      Updates the assistants in a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to update.
      assistantUsed - The assistant currently played.
      assistantsLeft - The assistants left in his hand.

    • enableEntrance

      public void enableEntrance(UserActionType nextUserAction)
      Enables students in this player's entrance to be selected, while specifying the next action (i.e. the action that requires the student to be selected).
      Parameters:
      nextUserAction - the next action to be taken.

    • disableEntrance

      public void disableEntrance()
      Disables students in this player's entrance.

    • enableDRStudents

      public void enableDRStudents()
      Enables students in this player's dining room to be selected.

    • disableDRStudents

      public void disableDRStudents()
      Disables students in this player's dining room.

    • enableIslands

      public void enableIslands()
      Enables all islands to be selected.

    • enableIslands

      public void enableIslands(UserActionType nextUserAction)
      Enables only islands that can actually be selected, while specifying the next action (i.e. the action that requires the island to be selected).
      Parameters:
      nextUserAction - the next action to be taken.

    • disableIslands

      public void disableIslands()
      Disables all islands.

    • enableClouds

      public void enableClouds()
      Enables clouds to be selected, while implicitly specifying the next action (i.e. the action that requires the cloud to be selected). It is always the take from cloud user action.

    • disableClouds

      public void disableClouds()
      Disables clouds.

    • enableTables

      public void enableTables()
      Enables all of this player's tables to be selected.

    • enableTables

      public void enableTables(Color color)
      Enables this player's table of the specified color to be selected.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the table to enable.

    • disableTables

      public void disableTables()
      Disables all of this player's table.

    • enableCharacters

      public void enableCharacters()
      Enables all characters to be selected.

    • disableCharacters

      public void disableCharacters()
      Disables all characters.

    • enableCharacterAbility

      public void enableCharacterAbility()
      Enables the active character to be selected to activate its ability.

    • disableCharacterAbility

      public void disableCharacterAbility()
      Disables the active character.

    • enableStudentChar

      public void enableStudentChar()
      Enables students on the active character to be selected.

    • disableStudentChar

      public void disableStudentChar()
      Disables students on the active character.

    • enableColorChar

      public void enableColorChar()
      Enables the color selection panel to let a color be selected.

    • disableColorChar

      public void disableColorChar()
      Disables the color selection panel.

    • enableEndTurn

      public void enableEndTurn()
      Enables the end turn button to be clicked.

    • disableEndTurn

      public void disableEndTurn()
      Disables the end turn button.

    • enableLast

      public void enableLast()
      Enables the last action that was active before activating a character ability. It uses the next user action saved to recover the previous state.

    • reEnableAll

      public void reEnableAll()
      Enables all elements that were temporarily disabled. This method doesn't enable each element individually but uses a global enabler; this means that only elements that were originally individually enabled will be actually selectable.

    • disableAllTemporary

      public void disableAllTemporary()
      Temporarily disables all elements. This method doesn't disable each element individually but uses a global disabler; this means that previously enabled elements are disabled at a global level, but when all elements are globally enabled the previously enabled elements will be selectable.
